dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly express their emotions, without fear of judgment.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions to themselves, only revealing them when necessary.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new experiences and take risks, even if it means facing uncertainty.
Your FarTwin will prefer to avoid uncertainty and stick with what they know, rather than taking unnecessary risks.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assertively and forcefully resolve conflicts, even if it means clashing with others.
Your FarTwin will avoid confrontations and try to smooth over conflicts, rather than addressing the underlying issues.

dimensions.label: Creativity Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will fully immerse themselves in creative activities, using all their senses to explore new ideas.
Your FarTwin will approach creativity from a logical and analytical perspective, analyzing data and patterns before expressing themselves.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently and assertively interact with others, making new connections and building relationships.
Your FarTwin will prefer to observe and listen in social situations, preferring smaller, more intimate gatherings.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems with a logical and systematic mindset, analyzing data and patterns before acting.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on their intuition to guide problem-solving efforts.

dimensions.label: Sense of Humor
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use sarcasm and irony to make pointed comments and poke fun at situations.
Your FarTwin will rely on dry wit and understatement to convey humor, often using subtle cues to catch others off guard.

dimensions.label: Motivation Drives
dimensions.description: What motivates your FarTwin to take action?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be motivated by external factors, such as rewards or recognition.
Your FarTwin will be driven by internal factors, such as personal values or a desire to help others.
